name: Conquer Humanity
description:
Become the Super Villain.

Train in the simulation room to master your superpowers and prepare to Conquer Humanity.

Your superpowers not only include laser eyes but also flying, hyper speed dashes, super strength and a variety of range and melee attacks.

Gore, Dismemberments and Destruction.

Master the combat and reach high Style Ranks by mixing up attacks and combos.

You are the strongest thing in the simulation, everything else can be destroyed, exploded or dismembered for those sweet slow motion moments.

Multiple enemies and Bosses.

Don't let your guard down, the simulation is filled with armed enemies and unique bosses.

Each boss has it's own weak points and tactics, practice their patterns to survive until the end.

WARNING: You thought you were good at games ? Think twice, this is actually difficult.If you're skilled, you can win the simulation without getting hit once but misjudging a move or not reacting fast enough can result in you being flatlined and disconnected out of the simulation.
